title: Lux Elementalist Skin vs. Sona DJ Skin
body:
How come when I change my DJ Sona {{champion:37}}  profile Icons they change the background art to the Mode She changes into, but when I change my lux icons its stays the same (gold Lux {{champion:99}} ) no matter what element I choose?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is due to Elementalist Lux having one splash, as opposed to DJ Sona who had three. For Elementalist Lux, you'll see the light form splash, regardless of the Elementalist Lux icon you have equipped.
Oh ok that makes sense thx!
